Text.Page:
I did something terrible, . Something I may never be able to fully atone for.

During my time with the Free Brotherhood, I created horrible weapons. I never suspected they'd be used against us, but I suppose that's no excuse."So what would you like me to do?"

I can't go on knowing that those weapons are still out there. Please, go collect them for me.

Round them up, bring them back, and I'll see to it that they're destroyed. They won't take any more innocent lives.
Thank you. I'll destroy them right away, and on my life, I'll never make anything like this again.
Pleaseâ€”you have to find those weapons before more people get hurt!
